I hereby appoint Prefr (Infocredit Services Pvt. Ltd.) as the authorised representative to receive my credit information from CIBIL / Equifax / Experian / CRIF High-mark (bureau). I hereby unconditionally consent to and instruct bureau to provide my credit information to me and Prefr

By submitting this form, I hereby authorise Prefr to do all of the following in connection with providing me with their services:

1. Retain a copy of my credit information, along with other information I have given them access to under this authorisation, in accordance with Prefrâ€™s Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy

2. Verify my identity and share personally identifiable information about me with the credit bureaus as required.
